title: Driver Sentenced to 12 Years in Hit-and-Run Death of Calgary Police Officer
description: Sgt. Andrew Harnett, 37, of the Calgary Police Service is shown in this undated handout image provided by the police service. (The Canadian Press/HO-Calgary Police Service)

title: Forestry Contractors on Helicopter That Crashed, Killing 2 Near Prince George, BC
description: A police helicopter prepares for takeoff from a staging area at Purden Lake Resort near the site of the crash on Sept. 26, 2023. (The Canadian Press/James Doyle)

title: US Soldier Freed From North Korea Is on His Way Back to the States
description: U.S. Army Private Travis T. King (wearing a black shirt and black cap) is seen in this picture taken during a tour of the tightly controlled Joint Security Area (JSA) on the border between the two Koreas at the truce village of Panmunjom, South Korea, on July 18, 2023. (Sarah Leslie/Handout via Reuters)

title: As Ethnic Armenians Flee Karabakh, Turkey Eyes Region’s Changing Political Map
description: Refugees from Nagorno-Karabakh, a region inhabited by ethnic Armenians, make a drink on a roadside as their vehicles queue on the road leading towards the Armenian border, on Sept. 26, 2023. (David Ghahramanyan/Reuters)

title: Trudeau Offers Apology on Behalf of Parliament for Honouring Nazi Unit Veteran

title: Comedian Rob Schneider Cancels Trip to Canada Over House Tribute to Nazi Unit Veteran
